THIS FILE WILL BE GENERATED BY THE BUILD SCRIPT

Run this command in the root of the repository to generate & serve this file: 
  npm run serve:example
This will generate a `bundled.js` file in the `example-bundled` directory. Alternatively, you can generate a CDN-based build: 
  npm run build:example:cdn
This will generate a `bundled_cdn.js` file in the `example-bundled` directory.
